title: An Outfit For Morgana !
body:
I found a wonderful art of Morgana yesterday and instantly fell in love with the outfit. I edited it to resemble the current one we have in-game. It should be considered if she ever gets a** VU**, I understand that there are more urgent champions on that list and that her TU was wonderfully done '.'

http://i.imgur.com/W95xlSZ.png
Touched up, redrawn and parts from other random images. The original's below.

Wingless
http://i.imgur.com/aFsK5Hb.png

 
Original by Vladbacescu: http://vladbacescu.tumblr.com/post/114062965621/morgana-visual-update-fan-concept

replies.body: I'll make them suffer.... with style!!!
Great Gear. Even in the lore Morg and Kay are sisters. Then looking at kay's gear vs Morgana's gear. Aren't they both from the same heaven?

> [{quoted}](name=ZeeWolfZ,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2Far5Qiz,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-01-24T21:56:16.334+0000)
>
> Great Gear. Even in the lore Morg and Kay are sisters. Then looking at kay's gear vs Morgana's gear. Aren't they both from the same heaven?

You do not simply put armor on Morgana.
Do you take off Kayles armor then?.
https://media3.giphy.com/media/asHT7eh4AwG9G/200_s.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Orangesilk,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2Far5Qiz,comment-id=000900000000,timestamp=2016-01-25T00:22:16.683+0000)
>
> Do you take off Kayles armor then?.

maybe.....?
taking off her helmet counts right?

We do need a new model for Morgana anyways, so this would be a great start in looking into it!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I love this!

To be quite honest, I always wanted her to have that open front dress and have a heavy stride.

She's a grounded angel and that would be great to have her have a power walk, and if you have seen Corpse Bride, that's really how I see her looking like.
Legs showing, a bit of swaying and a heavy step.
upvote cause morg vu pls
This is beautiful. RITO HIRE THIS WO/MAN
I'm really digging this. I hope Morg gets a VU soon.
Top image would make a good replacement for her default skin.
The original and the updated morgana winged style look amazing, great work!
Thanks!
You made some mistakes when cutting out the left hand, but otherwise good job.
Good eyes :D The wings took longer than expected so I deliberately brushed that detail under the carpet. You saw it thouuuugh V-V
I don't see the similarities @.@ Is it the armor pads on the side or the frontal skirt?
She should have falling feather particles.
It looks very pretty, but we don't need another "Karma." I'm rather fond of her current dress and we need the uniqueness. Not every woman needs to show off her legs.
the fact that she doesn't show her legs is a problem that's a reason why they changed Twitch

It's not a problem and not the reason why Twitch was changed. It's not mandatory to show legs on a game character. 

{{champion:42}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:37}} 

*Ahem*

Twitch had a "bicycle" legs thing going on. Morgana doesn't. 
That's why Twitch's legs were kept hidden. Morgana's dress is a unique style choice that should remain.

http://www.lolking.net/models?champion=25&skin=0

Tilt her so you can see her legs and select the "run" animation in the drop down menu.

She doesn't need to have excess sex appeal like the majority of women in this game. Already being essentially topless with a stylish bra on is enough for a fallen angel.

i wouldn't mind morgana to have sex appeal since she is supposed to be some kinda fallen angel you know the whole sin thing. some champions just shouldn't.....{{champion:43}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:39}}
I'd like to see morg have more feathers like a harpy, think it would improve her ascetics.

I started this game years ago with the sole intention of playing morgana. I watched dozens of videos cus she just seemed that interesting. she has had the same look for the entirety of the time I have played this game and before i started. this would be a very good way to give her a VU
Riot please use this its amazing!!!
That's really impressive picture bro !! I have that exactly picture I agree with this new look of Morg its really amazing and makes Morgana more good looking !
I saw a cinematic where her wings moved, it'd. If she was taller and didn't wear that shitty dress i'd like her more. If she tried to fly with her shit wings I'd be a fan.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
It would certainly look better than the ugly walking tent her lower half is currently.

Begin at 0:18
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PVsjQbFPIPY
Senpai! :3

The major thing I want out of a Morg Visual Update is her to be less 'fat' her hitbox feels to wide for her story and splash. It feels wrong to be so squishy, deal so much damage but be so fat because of dress hitbox.
This is gorgeous. Even the original, tho I think I like it better with the gold trim instead of silver. PLEASE YES.

Yeah I found this somehow familiar, maybe reminded me of Sivir?
But anyway this is gorgeous, and hot, I definitely love it!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Hmmm, she has a bit of an Indian look to her

I like her in a dress/gown though. It made her unique, original and distinct compared to many female champions who don't wear a dress in the battlefield. 

Old Karma used to wear a dress too until they took it away in her VU (excluding her skins).
nothing like trying to copy syndras outfit
